title: Equinoctial Sacrifice
description: What would you sacrifice for your child?  Hollyn is faced with this question when she gives birth to Calandra, alone in the woods, and pre-term. Hollyn suddenly finds her new daughterâ€™s life hanging in the balance when Akiye, the faerie of the autumn equinox, offers her a lifeline in exchange for saving the life of her newborn daughter. Now Hollyn must leave everything behind, including Calandra, and return to Faerie to ensure her daughter can fulfill her destiny and fix the world her own family has been tampering with for generations.  Will Hollyn be able to ensure her daughter can put a stop to the cycle, or will something else destroy her in the process?  Destinies are set into motion, wills are tested, and lives are changed forever in this prequel to the Euphoria series.
author: Lainy Lane
